## Block.hasField() method

Is field bound to this block

**Signature:**

```typescript
hasField(name: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the field. |

**Returns:**

boolean

Whether the field is bound to this block.
